subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Before the Nets' season ended Tuesday night, the team president Rod Thorn gave the tandem of Vince Carter and Richard Jefferson a vote of confidence, saying he would be surprised if they were not back with the team next season.
snippet: Before the Nets' season ended Tuesday night, the team president Rod Thorn gave the tandem of Vince Carter and Richard Jefferson a vote of confidence, saying he would be surprised if they were not back with the team next season.
